arts.ttl: Michael Carrick on George Edmundson's loan recall and whether he might return to Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Michael Carrick has suggested Middlesbrough will try to re-sign George Edmundson this month if a deal is viable, after Ipswich Town recalled him from his loan on Tuesday. Asked about Edmundson’s Boro exit and whether they might still be able to negotiate a deal for him to return to the Riverside before the end of the transfer window, Carrick said: “We knew it was a possibility.

arts.ttl: Huge Middlesbrough boost as Liverpool loan star Ben Doak set to stay at the Riverside
arts.sum: But after Doak netted an all-important second goal in Boro ’s 2-0 victory over West Brom on Tuesday evening, the Boro boss revealed the good news on the 19-year-old wing star. Middlesbrough will be keeping goal-hero Ben Doak for the rest of the season after the deadline passed for Liverpool to recall the winger.

arts.ttl: Ben Doak scores Middlesbrough screamer amid £30million transfer interest in Liverpool loanee
arts.sum: The winger netted a stunner in a 2-0 victory against West Brom to boost his team's hopes of winning promotion to the Premier League

arts.ttl: Tony Mowbray suffers defeat in first game back at West Brom
arts.sum: The 61-year-old was appointed as Baggies head coach for a second stint and oversaw his first match since recovering from bowel cancer.

arts.ttl: George Edmundson recalled from Middlesbrough loan by Ipswich Town after rejected transfer bids
arts.sum: Ipswich Town have recalled George Edmundson from his Middlesbrough loan after rejecting two bids from Boro for the defender. Having rejected two Boro bids, it would appear Ipswich are banking on Boro upping their bid for the 27-year-old or being forced to keep him at Portman Road until the end of the season, at which point he is out of contract.

arts.ttl: QPR, Blackburn Rovers, Middlesbrough offered chance to sign versatile Dutchman
arts.sum: QPR, Blackburn Rovers, Middlesbrough, Swansea City and Stoke City have all been offered the chance to sign Timothy… The post QPR, Blackburn Rovers, Middlesbrough offered chance to sign versatile Dutchman appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: New manager hunt led Bilkul to Tony Mowbray after West Brom's area to upgrade revealed
arts.sum: West Bromwich Albion had Tony Mowbray in mind for months before Carlos Corberan's departure - and they proceeded with his appointment once all parties had established that the returning head coach was medically clear to return to work. Mowbray ticked an awful lot of boxes for Albion; not only were there the original ties with the club, of which many supporters still reflect fondly for the style of football and success on the pitch, but in the intervening period he has proven time and again at various clubs that he has been able to reinvent and tease strong performances and results from the squads he's worked with.

arts.ttl: Leeds United, West Brom, Norwich City weigh up loan swoop for 23-year-old striker

arts.ttl: Player at West Brom to complete transfer – Final stages after beating Championship competition
arts.sum: Isaac Price is currently at West Bromwich Albion to complete his move to the Championship club from Standard Liege. That’s according to journalist Sacha Tavolieri, who reports that the midfielder is now very close to sealing his move to the Hawthorns. The Baggies have pushed to sign Price over the past few days.
